name: Arena of Arrow-3V3 MOBA
description:
【game introduction】
"Archers vs. Draw" as a sequel to the archers' battle, the combat experience is fully upgraded, the heroic role is vivid, and the rich and varied combat modes, that is, the operational and strategic aspects of MOBA games, and the simplicity of the IO gameplay Fun, fight anywhere, anytime, in just 3 minutes, you can fight with players around the world!

[game features]
1: IO classic continuation
Hundreds of skills, thousands of combinations, random skills, random scenes, each game is a new start, kill BOSS, win the jewel, fight for IO chaos
2.3V3 fair competition
Present a smooth combat experience, hero strategy, no training, face-to-face direct confrontation!
3. Heroes with distinct personality, cool and diverse skin
Each hero has unique skills and can be replaced with different skins for the hero, cute and cool, worth having!
4. Rich gameplay and experience a variety of combat strategies!
Reward mode, gems competition, survival mode, war front line, multiple maps to switch freely, let you play forever!
5. Global service, match in real time!
Smart matching system to fight with hundreds of millions of players around the world!
6. Operation & Strategy, Battle to the Peak
Heroes match, powerful kill, scene destruction, unlimited possibilities! Whether you are an operational flow or a stream of consciousness, you can climb the peak!

【contact us】
